biotools.summary: DeepKhib is a web server that could predict lysine 2-Hydroxyisobutyrylation sites. it takes protein sequence data as input and uses one-hot encoding scheme and One-Dimensional Convolution Neural Network.

bioschemas.name: DeepKhib
bioschemas.summary: DeepKhib is a web server that could predict lysine 2-Hydroxyisobutyrylation sites. it takes protein sequence data as input and uses one-hot encoding scheme and One-Dimensional Convolution Neural Network.
